channel.title: No-Clip command (317 [PI])
channel.description: I am trying to add a no-clip command to my rsps. Could someone provide me with a model of the command, or tutorial on how to add? would be greatly appreciated. Also, I would like this command to be owner and co-owner only.. (playerRights == 3 || playerRights == 6) :P

item.title: No-Clip command (317 [PI])
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Supplying some code might help.

But it looks like you put the code within another statement, or when you put it in there you might have moved some other code out of place.

Read full topic

item.title: No-Clip command (317 [PI])
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

i put it in my client.java and got five errors. These errors aren’t regarding the command i dont think, but do you have any idea how to fix?

Read full topic

item.title: No-Clip command (317 [PI])
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

no-clipping is done through the client:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/277670-need-pi-noclip-command.html
There’s the code…
Now in Client.java (client sided) look for "::"
you should find the area that has some other commands, and the part where it sends the command to the server.

Add the noclip command there.

Read full topic
